That's an interesting question.  

I would probably say, Tucson is G2, due =
to the fact that he's quite a bit younger than Leo Prime.  That also includ=
es his sister, Straight Shot, who probably were transported off Cybertron a=
nd near Atlantis so is to allow them ample time to recover from near trauma=
tic injuries.  Tucson was taken off line after he got pegged by Cyclonus an=
d was in some sort of Stasis lock for a couple of vorns.  Then he travels t=
o Ancient Earth with Perseus.

Nightshift is also G2, how he got to Ancient=
 Earth was probably due to the fact that as a pretender, he had connections=
 even with Decepticon forces, and somehow hitched a ride with them, ending =
up on Ancient Earth.  Nightshift is definitely built with a vehicle alt for=
m, and he finds it hard to adapt, but does the best he can under his circum=
bstances.

That's the best I can think of for now.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
